function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Fluorescent lamp efficiency falling below 70% in UV-C range at low temperatures and airflow","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness in killing pathogens, increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Use of amalgam technology to stabilize temperature and extend effective life, control operating power to maintain UV-C performance","Technologies":"Amalgam technology, controllable high-frequency ballast","People":"Building occupants, people in proximity to HVAC systems","Owner":"Facility managers, HVAC technicians"},{"Description":"Shortened life cycle of fluorescent lamps due to excessive switching cycles","Impact":"Decreased UV-C power output, reduced energy efficiency","Mitigation":"Implementation of controllable high-frequency ballast, regulation of operating power during lamp life, use of amalgam technology","Technologies":"Controllable high-frequency ballast, amalgam technology","People":"Facility managers, maintenance personnel","Owner":"Facility managers, maintenance personnel"},{"Description":"Significant power consumption and economic costs associated with UV-C system","Impact":"Increased electricity consumption, reduced economic return on UV-C system","Mitigation":"Regulation of operating power, use of energy-efficient technologies","Technologies":"Amalgam technology, controllable high-frequency ballast","People":"Facility managers, financial decision-makers","Owner":"Facility managers, financial decision-makers"}]}
